com.jmex.physics
Interface PhysicsUpdateCallback

public interface PhysicsUpdateCallback

This class provides a callback for extending the behaviour of the physics. From all the methods in subclasses the scenegraph should not be altered.

Author:
Irrisor

Method Summary
